kvs.subtitle: --- FAIR DAO (Fair and Transparent Decentralized Autonomous Organization)
kvs.subdescription: The FAIR token is fairly launched on the SunPump platform, with no pre-sale, no additional issuance, and no distribution plans.
kvs.page-description-opensource: We have open-sourced most of our code. If you have free time, you can join us to jointly promote the development of FAIR DAO.
kvs.dao-1-des: The FAIR protocol is managed by a decentralized global community, where all FAIR token holders, developers, and ecosystem participants can propose ideas and suggestions for community governance.
kvs.dao-2-des: All votes in FAIR DAO are conducted on the blockchain, which cannot be tampered with by anyone, thus ensuring the fairness, efficiency, and transparency of governance.
kvs.dao-3: No Pre-Sale Mechanism, No Team Allocation
kvs.dao-3-des: Everyone is equal. The Fair token is issued and traded on the SunPump platform, with no pre-sale mechanism and no team allocation.
kvs.dao-4-des: Ecosystem participants build open-source applications and create a prosperous ecosystem by staking Fair tokens.

open-items.name: Shared Library
open-items.des: FAIR DAO Shared Library is a framework for rapidly developing desktop and mobile applications, supporting mainstream mobile devices, PCs, and web browsers.

open-items.name: Eco Apps
open-items.des: Fair Box serves as the carrier for ecosystem applications, integrating Tron and Ethereum wallets.

open-items.name: Official Website
open-items.des: Source code for the current website

open-items.name: Smart Contracts
open-items.des: Collection of FAIR DAO smart contracts
